name: Rerandum
culture_notes: Riveric dialect dominates; Coastal Tongues used in trade
diet centers on smoked fish and river grains
constraints: rituals require scarce imported reagents and skilled labors
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
combustion industry limited; no high-pressure steam megatechs
notes: estuary location uses navigational auguries alongside charts
silt and tides dictate seasonal labour and trade patterns
